jumbotron.h2: Best effort email encryption for the masses
jumbotron.p1: End to end encryption shouldn't be difficult. MEG makes it easy! MEG is an app you install on your phone. It works in combination with an email program on your computer. All encryption happens on the phone but the email is sent from your computer. This allows you to send encrypted emails from any computer while keeping all your private data in one place.

card.body: All encryption happens on your phone. This is the only place where private keys are stored. There's never any need to transfer your private keys to another device.

card-callout.body:
Android app
Thunderbird client
MEG Server
